parameter.name: plugin
parameter.description: A pattern for the plugin to use.

parameter.name: plugin_options
parameter.description: Plugin options as a JSON object.

parameter.name: interface
parameter.description: This is the interface where the RAM is connected.

parameter.name: ram_start
parameter.description: Only if interface is RAM: the start of the RAM area.

parameter.name: ram_size
parameter.description: Only if interface is RAM: The size of the RAM area in bytes.

parameter.name: sdram_netx
parameter.description: This specifies the chip type for the parameter set.

parameter.name: sdram_general_ctrl
parameter.description: Only if interface is SDRAM: The complete value for the netX general_ctrl register.

parameter.name: sdram_timing_ctrl
parameter.description: Only if interface is SDRAM: The complete value for the netX timing_ctrl register.

parameter.name: sdram_mr
parameter.description: Only if interface is SDRAM: The complete value for the netX mr register.

parameter.name: sdram_size_exponent
parameter.description: Only if interface is SDRAM: The size exponent.

parameter.name: sram_chip_select
parameter.description: Only if interface is SRAM: The chip select of the SRAM device.

parameter.name: sram_ctrl
parameter.description: Only if interface is SRAM: The complete value for the netX extsramX_ctrl register.

parameter.name: sram_size
parameter.description: Only if interface is SRAM: The size of the SRAM area in bytes.

parameter.name: ddr_parameter_400
parameter.description: Only if interface is DDR: the DDR parameter file for 400MHz.

parameter.name: ddr_parameter_600
parameter.description: Only if interface is DDR: the DDR parameter file for 600MHz.

parameter.name: ddr_size_exponent
parameter.description: Only if interface is DDR: The size exponent.

parameter.name: checks
parameter.description: This determines which checks to run. Select one or more values from this list and separate them with commata: 08BIT, 16BIT, 32BIT and BURST.

parameter.name: loops
parameter.description: The number of loops to run.

parameter.name: patterns
parameter.description: The number of loops to run.
